label: Label
landing_features_body_0: Proposed and developed solutions share following common features:
landing_features_body_1: Industry standards and Market good practices
landing_features_body_1_details: Solutions' proposals, properties and functions are built upon industry standards that correspond to market good practices
landing_features_body_2_details: Solutions cover from beginning to end of operating processes, ensuring consistency, compatibility and comprehensiveness
landing_features_body_3_details: Application of LEAN philosophy, approach and tools. Facilitate agility and allow mobility via system applications
landing_features_body_4_details: Exploit effectively economy sharing resources to maximize satisfaction of demands and minimize cost for business
landing_features_body_5_details: High capabilities for customization on standard core models enable accommodation of business eligible needs
landing_features_body_6_details: Designed towards opened system. Definitions, principles, protocols and tools of solutions are clearly predefined that enable connection, communication, integration and support scalability.
landing_home_desc: Design and implement frameworks of governance, operating policies, procedures and system applications to enhance effectiveness in management, operation and controlling on core and supporting businesses processes.
landing_opening_body_1: Advocate end to end solutions developed by Subject Matter Experts that support corporates to design and implement frameworks of governance, operating policies and procedures based on industry's standards and market's good practices, including embedment of these frameworks into system applications to enhance effectiveness of implementation, bring lean, agility and mobility into operation, optimize costs and enable scalability.
landing_solutions_00_desc: A solution of planning and management of business resources, including: People, Assets, Inventories, Finance, IT, etc... We advocate the solution to help business rationalise core and supporting processes to reduce processing times, increase productivity, standardise and integrate processes. By removing frequently faced hurdles in implementing ERP, our solution support business at different scales to be able to approach and adopt standard management models with ERP supports to attain effectiveness in management, operating and controlling activities
landing_solutions_10_desc: A solution establishes standards and processes to assure data integrity and maintains control on a collection of master data of business entities and objects. Our solution helps business to manage data from its initiation, once changes and till end of master data life cycle
landing_solutions_20_desc: A solution supports corporate governance, risk management and compliance, including internal control and internal audit. Our solution help business set up and integrate mechanisms to tolerate, monitor, control and detect risks for appropriate, timely and effective mitigations
landing_solutions_30_desc: A solution formulates framework on management, development, motivation, appraisal and incentisation of human resources. We offer the all in one solution that could help business achieve effectiveness in its management and decisions that promote relationship between employees and companies

landing_solutions_40_desc: Solutions include budget planning, issuance and authorization at different levels of solutions and activities, monitoring and supervision of execution and effectiveness of budget utilization towards attainment of business objectives; reporting by managerial nature, dimensions and for regulatory and statistical reporting
landing_solutions_41_desc: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Repellat fugiat, laboriosam, voluptatem, optio vero odio nam sit officia accusamus minus error nisi architecto nulla ipsum dignissimos. Odit sed qui, dolorum!

landing_solutions_50_desc: A solution supports management of procurment activities in business. We propose the solution to control input and spending costs via professional, effective and value for money procurement arrangements and processes
landing_solutions_51_desc: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Repellat fugiat, laboriosam, voluptatem, optio vero odio nam sit officia accusamus minus error nisi architecto nulla ipsum dignissimos. Odit sed qui, dolorum!
landing_solutions_60_desc: A solution for sales and distribution management, covering from orders taking, picking, packing goods until delivery completion. Our solution help business to manage inventories and all physical  movements of inventory at warehouses or distribution centers
landing_solutions_70_desc: A solution to develop and nurture customer relationship from determining potential leads, approaching and understanding customers' needs to meet customer demands and expectation, and maintain relationship via post sales services
landing_solutions_80_desc: A solution helps business to formulate its products, from materials planning and forecast, preparation of BOMs and Routings, calculation of material-labour-equipment costs, orders based production, to execution of production planning
landing_solutions_body_0: Our solutions are ready or being completed to serve your business:
